title: Answer a Product Warranty Question
description: A customer calls customer service to ask about the warranty on a product they purchased six months ago.

tasks.description: Look up the customer's purchase history to find the original order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the record of the sale.

tasks.description: Look up the product's warranty information in the knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the warranty terms for that specific product.

tasks.description: Inform the customer about the warranty details and how to file a claim with the manufacturer if needed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer receives accurate information about their warranty.
